official_title: To direct the release of all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to, and all restrictions, conditions, and limitations on the use or conveyance of, certain real property located in Oklahoma County, Oklahoma.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to release all U.S. interests in, and restrictions on the use or conveyance of, certain real property in Oklahoma County, Oklahoma. Makes exceptions from such release with respect to: (1) the reversionary interest of the United States in such property for national defense purposes; and (2) the right of the United States to a perpetual easement for the operation of aircraft to and from Tinker Air Force Base, Oklahoma.

titles.title: To direct the release of all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to, and all restrictions, conditions, and limitations on the use or conveyance of, certain real property located in Oklahoma County, Oklahoma.
